revisionDesc.change: Pull translation out of APIS record.

listBibl.bibl: F.A.J. Hoogendijk - P. van Minnen, Papyri, Ostraca, Parchments and Waxed Tablets in the Leiden Papyrological Institute (P. L. Bat. 25) (Papyrologica Lugduno-Batava 25, Leiden 1991), p. 141-142 P.Leid.Inst. 28 is also cited as P. L. Bat. 25 28

div.ab:
P. L. Bat. 25 28 (English)
Sansneus, son of Sansneus, grandson of Mysthes (?) - - - for ¾ 1/32 arouras of revenue land, ½ 1/16 artabas of wheat and - - - artabas of barley (?) Orseus, son of Sansneus, grandson of Mysthes - - - for ½ 1/16 1/64 of revenue land, 1/3 1/8 artabas of wheat - - - Sintamis (?), daughter of Phasis, granddaughter if Horu, represented by - - - and Orsenouphis, son of Orseus, grandson of Stotoetis (?) - - - Heron, son of an unknown father, whose mother is Soteris - - - Sotas, son of Sotas, son of Orseus - - - for ¼ 1/8 1/16 1/32 1/64 arouras of royal land, 1 1/x artabas of wheat for seed - - - - - - son of Chiasis, grandson of Chiasis - - - son of Tepheros, grandson of Sansneus - - - for seed - - - Seleucus, son of an unknown father, whose mother is - - - Pharus (?), son of an unknown father, whose mother is - - - for seed - - - Eubius, son of an unknown father, whose mother is - - -
